user.title: Set up Geodnet Miner Monitor
user.description: Enter the last 5 characters of your Geodnet miner's serial number and the full API URL

error.invalid_serial_number_format: Invalid serial number format. It should be the last 5 alphanumeric characters.
error.invalid_api_url_format: Invalid API URL format. It should start with http:// or https:// and include the domain or IP address.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Geodnet server

abort.already_configured: This Geodnet miner is already configured
